item.title: Developing for Sagemath
item.description: For my first post, I’ll explain how to begin developing for Sagemath. This post is essentially a gist that I shared with members of the UW Sage Seminar. This is a short version of the official guide. Official Sagemath guide https://doc.sagemath.org/html/en/developer/index.html Setting up local development copy The first task will be to obtain a local development copy of Sagemath. Clone Sagemath and checkout the develop branch
